treatments_requested.name: Benlysta
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: FDA approved for ANA or double stranded DNA positive Lupus

guidelines_details: The patient does not meet the current literature-based standard of care guidelines for treatment with Benlysta.
soc_details: The patient has not failed two prior standard of care therapies.

study_details.key_findings: The precise profile of the SLE patient who would derive the most benefit from belimumab treatment remains to be defined.

rationale: The requested Benlysta auto injectable is not supported as medically necessary for treatment of this patient’s medical condition. The patient does not meet the current literature-based standard of care guidelines.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in rheumatology, actively practicing, expert in the treatment of the enrollee’s medical condition.
